caption: A ship is engulfed in fierce flames, and several terrified people rush to escape. A boy operates a weapon and fires it at the evil dragon. The dragon quickly breathes fire at the boy. Fortunately, a Viking arrives in time, picks up the boy, and carries him away to safety. They engage in conversationã€‚ The Vikings gather around a round table for a meeting. One of the Vikings drinks from a cup and converses with another Viking. A boy enters a forest and discovers a broken tree. He cautiously peeks out and spots a black dragon. Armed with a dagger, he approaches and finds the dragon securely tied up.
